about_the_game:
SUPPORT US!

Because Love Birds is free to play, buying the soundtrack is a great way to support us!

THE MUSIC

All of these songs are made by me (Jaxon Hill), over the 2 year course of making 'Love Birds' I recorded 24 songs.
There are 12 battle themes, and 12 peaceful themes in our soundtrack. Every song is used in game at different points, usually starting at a random point in the track.
Peaceful themes are played when you respawn, Battle themes are played when you fight!

HOW IT WAS MADE

I've made music my whole life, specifically Rock music. All of these songs were recorded the same way I record punk music. It's loud, it's raw, and it isn't perfect.
Lots of guitar, drums, and bass. A healthy dose of bongos, and instruments from the DAW.

name: Love Birds Epic Soundtrack
short_description: Here are 24 tracks, all made by yours truly Jaxon Hill. This is the best way to support us, and also the best way to listen to a great soundtrack! 12 Peaceful Themes, and 12 Battle Themes. All of which are Bird Themes. Enjoy!
